LANGUAGE.LABEL: Custom Email Prospect
SPAMMING is the sending of unsolicitated email and is strictly prohibited.

Select a Lead Page to email to your new prospect. Enter the name and email address of your new prospect. Your newly added prospect will be emailed the message below with a link to the selected Lead Page.

Select a Lead Page to email to your prospect. Your prospect will be emailed the message below with a link to the selected Lead Page. You can optionally select an email template after you select a lead page.
First Name
Last Name
Press [Shift]+[Enter] to insert a new line. The email message must contain {link} which will be replaced with the link to the Lead Page.
